LanguageData.Miho_Plasma_Hediff.label: 갑옷 융해
LanguageData.Miho_Plasma_Hediff.description: 갑옷이 열에 의해 부분적으로 액체화 되었습니다.
LanguageData.Miho_Plasma_Hediff.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.Miho_Plasma_Hediff.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.Miho_Plasma_Hediff.stages.2.label: minor melted
LanguageData.Miho_Plasma_Hediff.stages.3.label: moderate melted
LanguageData.Miho_Plasma_Hediff.stages.4.label: severe melted
LanguageData.Miho_Plasma_Hediff.stages.5.label: totally melted
LanguageData.Miho_Neddle_Hediff.label: 동충하초화
LanguageData.Miho_Neddle_Hediff.description: 동충하초화 되었습니다. 사망시 태양화를 수확 할 수 있습니다.
LanguageData.Miho_Neddle_Hediff.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.Miho_Neddle_Hediff.stages.1.label: initial
LanguageData.Miho_Neddle_Hediff.stages.2.label: minor
LanguageData.Miho_Neddle_Hediff.stages.3.label: moderate
LanguageData.Miho_Neddle_Hediff.stages.4.label: severe
